$HYPEi feel a little bearish cuz measures haven't been taken since the death of infofi and I feel most of Hypes marketing was from the INFOFI farming

Breaking news from yesterday

- Kaito sunsets Yaps, introduces Kaito studio to connect creators with brands

- MilkyWay protocol announced shutdown

- Monero XMR surged ~80% after a hacker laundered $282M in stolen BTC/LTC through Monero

- US crypto market structure legislation hit a new obstacle after Senate Judiciary Committee leaders Chuck Grassley and Dick Durbin objected to the inclusion of the Blockchain Regulatory Certainty Act (BRCA) in the latest draft

- Bitcoin app layer, Citrea launched ctUSD, a native Bitcoin stablecoin

- Dreamcash has announced the launch of new RWA HIP-3 perpetual markets on Hyperliquid in collaboration with Tether and Selini Capital

- Sentient announced the SENT tokenomics, with 44% dedicated to community initiatives, airdrops, and incentives

- Belarusian President Alexander Lukashenko has signed Decree No. 19, creating a legal framework for cryptobanks  to combine digital token operations with conventional banking, payment, and financial services

- Starting January 28, 2026, Google Play will prohibit unregistered overseas cryptocurrency exchanges and software wallets from being listed or updated in South Korea. 

- Goldman Sachs CEO David Solomon revealed that the bank is dedicating significant resources to tokenization, stablecoins, and prediction markets 

- Christopher Wood, Jefferiesâ€™ global head of equity strategy, has removed Bitcoin from the bankâ€™s GREED & fear model portfolio, reallocating the 10% stake into physical gold bullion and gold-mining stocks (5% each). 

- Patrick Witt, Executive Director of the White House Digital Assets Advisory Committee, confirmed that digital assets seized from Samourai Wallet have not been and will not be liquidated by the U.S. Department of Justice

- Vitalik posted that era is ending when Ethereum traded off self-sovereignty, privacy, and trustlessness to scale and chase mainstream adoption. The roadmap now explicitly prioritizes users being able to verify, transact, and interact without trusting intermediaries again

- Crypto bank Anchorage digital eyes $200Mâ€“$400M raise ahead of potential 2026 IPO

$HYPE

It has been quite fun to trade Hype as of late, as price kept trending higher from $24 (VAL) and kept rejecting from the VAH.

For Hype to trade higher, it needs to get above the $26 level, otherwise trading this $24-26 range looks good

#BTC Price Analysis#  #Macro Insights#  #CMC Smart Quests#

$HYPE is consolidating around the $25 zone, showing resilience after recent volatility. Buyers continue to defend the $24.7 support, while price presses against near-term resistance overhead. 

A clean break and hold above this range could open room for continuation, while loss of support may invite a deeper pullback.

Momentum is coiling, expansion likely ahead.
#Macro Insights# #HYPE #Altcoin Season# #Meme Alpha#

Over $200M in Hyperliquid buybacks in Q1? ðŸ’¥  Here is a short term trade around $HYPE  that is live on Polymarket.  Crypto is no longer just buying tokens, and waiting.  With prediction markets, you can trade individual events around your favorite assets, whether it is product updates, team actions or in this case buybacks.  Your information becomes the edge, not just execution.  Mix and stack trades across different tokens and narratives, to build your own winning environment.  #Altcoin Season#

Weekend Market Outlook: Whales Hedge, Bulls Eye $100K  As we head into the weekend, the options market is flashing mixed signals. While yesterday saw significant whale-tier hedgingâ€”dominated by over $1.5M in BTC Puts targeting the $93k levelâ€”the broader setup remains combative.  Despite the defensive flows, Open Interest for this weekend is heavily skewed towards bullish targets. Traders are aggressively positioning for a breakout, with massive Call walls stacked at $97.5k and the psychological $100K barrier.  Key Altcoin Watch: Smart money isn't just watching Bitcoin. Speculative rotation is heating up in the altcoin sector, with notable Call buying activity detected in Ethena ($ENA ) and Hyperliquid ($HYPE ) ahead of Sunday's expirations.  Expectation: Expect a volatile weekend as bearish hedging collides with bullish expiration targets. If BTC defends the $93k support, look for fireworks in the altcoin market.

$HYPE  at 25.52 feels stretched but not broken.
Momentum is still there, yet this is where patience matters.

Chasing here is risk.
Waiting for structure is strategy.

Strong assets donâ€™t disappear after a run.
They reset, absorb, then decide the next direction.

25.52 is a decision zone.
